amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions in the bill which allow for drilling applications to be deemed approved after a period of 60 days even if the Interior Department has not completed its review of an application and ensured that the drilling was safe.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 112-540 to strike language in the underlying legislation that would require drilling permits to be deemed approved a 60 day deadline, which could expose public lands to undue risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 255 (Roll no. 407).
